author: deluckybrick
title: ANOTHER FAST CAR!
review:
This car is just too fast to be allowed!
It is so fast, it just wont go anywhere, it just spins around in circles, but it is so fun to watch.

Pros:
Easy build
Fast Engine
Cool colors

Cons:
Spins all the time

author: Alemas
title: Boring...
review:
This car isn't great. The driver is just a head attached on a 2x2 driver "body". Also, the design is boring, as it has no interesting features.

Pros:

Pull-back motor

Cons:

Everything else!

Overall, not a good set.
